I recently bought the HP Stream (now just called "HP Laptop") to see if it's improved since 2014. Spoiler alert: it hasn't, and I'm shocked it's still being sold in 2024. In this video, I break down why this outdated piece of tech is still on store shelves and why you should avoid it at all costs.

Chapter Titles:
0:00 What is the HP Stream?
1:46 Unboxing
6:49 “Performance”
8:34 Screen
9:52 Why Does It Exist
title: I bought the WORST Laptop in 2024...
